In the Terracotta Oasis Expansion Pack, you'll discover an exotic new land where you'll meet 4 familiar faces from STORY OF SEASONS!

70050000025190.name: Olive Town Mystery Files
70050000025190.description:
Get ready for the STORY OF SEASONS series' very first mystery scenario!

* The sub-scenarios are small sets of quests, events, and outfits that are separate from the main game's scenario.

[Summary]
Strange incidents are happening all over Olive Town! It's up to you, Mikey, and Cindy to shed some light on these mysterious events. Get ready for the STORY OF SEASONS series' very first mystery scenario!

70050000025209.name: The Thrice Damned 2: The Sunken Kingdom
70050000025209.description:
A mythical underground city with a tremendously tantalising temple at its very centre? Deadly cave-dwelling nasties hiding around every corner waiting to pounce? Just another Tuesday for the Strange Brigade!

Mind your head adventurer, The Sunken Kingdom is the second brand new mission in The Thrice Damned campaign. 

You might have liberated the first Shield of Bes fragment from those fiendish foes, but there's still work to be done! Continue the story with this thrilling new mission and blast your way through a captivatingly colossal city solo or in 2-4 player co-op!

70050000025212.name: Bonus Pack
70050000025212.description: The Bonus Pack includes 4 pompous lighthouses and the blueprints to 5 magnificent parks with varying types of sculptures.

70050000025213.name: TerraTech - Warriors of Future Past Pack
70050000025213.description: Blending influences from the warriors of Feudal Japan and classic Mecha-Anime, this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for the Venture (Shinobi) and Hawkeye (Shogun) corporations will give your Techs an iconic look.

70050000025223.name: Supporter Pack

70050000025228.name: TerraTech - Fantabulous Contraptions Pack
70050000025228.description: Follow in the footsteps of engineering pioneers with this set of unique custom blocks and themed skins for Better Future (Dirigible) and GeoCorp (Locomotive) corporations.

70050000025240.name: The Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos
70050000025240.description: The Outer Worlds: Murder on Eridanos will launch in 2021. Halcyon Helen’s final (and finest!) adventure.

70050000025372.name: Truck Driver - UK Paint Jobs DLC
70050000025372.description:
“Fancy a British lorry?” With six different paint jobs, you can customize your truck with classic British designs. Create a truck that perfectly reflects your love for the United Kingdom with paint jobs of typical British symbols.

About UK Paint Jobs DLC 
Whether it’s the London skyline, the Barbary Lion or the Big Ben, with this pack you can drive around Truck Driver with British pride. All paint jobs are applicable to every in-game truck. The pack includes: 

-British flag 
-Barbary Lion 
-London skyline 
-Norman Gate 
-Big Ben 
-Stonehenge

70050000025404.name: Ryu - Helmetless Crimson Hawk Ranger skin
70050000025404.description: This unlocks Ryu - Helmetless Crimson Hawk Ranger skin, to be played in Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid

70050000025439.name: Tennis World Tour 2 - Juan Martin Del Potro & Victoria Azarenka
70050000025439.description:
This DLC includes 2 additional players:
- Juan Martin Del Potro
- Victoria Azarenka

70050000025765.name: Kaze and the Wild Masks - Pre-Order DLC
70050000025765.description:
Contains 12 skins

Kaze's Skins:
- Dark
- Moon
- Oldschool
- Ranger
- Jungle
- White

Hogo's Skins:
- Bubble
- Dark
- Doom
- Dragon
- Ghost
- Moon

70050000025835.name: Legendary Threads Set
70050000025835.intro: Borrow the power of the legendary Player himself with this set of equippable items based on the outfit worn by Neku in The World Ends with You!
70050000025835.description:
This gear set contains five equippable items once used by the legendary Neku. These items are normally unavailable until you proceed considerably far in the story, so they will give you a leg up in the early days of the Game, and provide you with powerful unlockable abilities that will serve you well until the very end!

・Legendary Headphones
Greatly increases the item drop rate.
・Legendary Tank Top
Greatly increases Attack.
・Legendary Shorts
Shortens the duration the wearer is knocked down.
・Legendary Sneakers
Increases movement speed during combat.
・Legendary Music Player
Enormously increases HP.

70050000025836.name: Reapers' Game Survival Set
70050000025836.intro: This three-piece item set will support your journey through NEO: The World Ends with You and help you make it out of the Reapers' Game alive!
70050000025836.description:
This set provides two items selected to help you survive the deadly Reapers' Game by increasing your HP and allowing you to heal up mid-fight. Also includes an arrangement of "Twister" that's sure to get you revved up and ready for combat!

・Pin: UFO Rescue
Hold the button to slowly restore your team's HP.
・Threads: Virupaksa Hoodie
Greatly increases HP.
・CD: Twister (NEO Mix)
Adds this song as a main menu music option.

70050000025837.name: The Thrice Damned 1: Isle of the Dead
70050000025837.description:
A fortified pirate settlement in an uncharted region of the Mediterranean? Reports of murderous monsters roaming a remote jungle paradise? All in a day's work for the Strange Brigade!

Welcome, adventurers, to the Isle of the Dead, the first mission in a thrilling new three-part Strange Brigade campaign: The Thrice Damned!
Seteki may have been defeated, but there’s no rest for the wicked, not even for a spot of tea! Expand your Strange Brigade adventure with this new story mission, explore a spooky island solo or in 2-4 player co-op and send legions of evil skeletons back to the sand from whence they came!

70050000025839.name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered Time Attack
70050000025839.description:
A new way to experience the 100-hero Unite Action spectacular The Wonderful 101: Remastered has just made the scene in the form of a free DLC game mode!

Time is a purely action-focused challenge in which you can try your hand at beating stages as fast as possible. Non-essential cutscenes are skipped automatically to let you blast through the stage of your choice stress-free, and when trying to outdo yourself, you can keep an eye on the new Record Gauge to see how you're stacking up against your personal best! You can also upload your times to online rankings and see how you compare to Wonderful Ones from around the world!

*Story Mode must be completed on any difficulty to access Time Attack.
*This DLC was made possible through a crowdfunding stretch goal supported by 33,199 fans, who we'd like to thank from the bottom of our hearts!

To the mighty heroes who've banded together across the globe to repel the GEATHJERK invaders, we present this Time Attack in gratitude.
UNITE UP and see how fast you can save the planet again!

70050000025845.name: Maniax Pack
70050000025845.intro: Reawaken your inner demon in a modernized version of the acclaimed ATLUS classic, Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster.
70050000025845.description:
Relive the original version!
Adds a mode where Raidou Kuzunoha is replaced by none other than Dante of Devil May Cry fame.
*You can only select this mode when starting a new game.

70050000025846.name: Mercy and Expectation Map Pack
70050000025846.intro: Reawaken your inner demon in a modernized version of the acclaimed ATLUS classic, Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster.
70050000025846.description:
Adds "Little Master's Mercy" and "Master's Expectation". 

"Little Master's Mercy"
Earn items that give you experience points in the extra dungeon "Where the Demi-Fiend was Born".

"Master's Expectation"
Earn items that give you money in the extra dungeon "Center of the Conception".

*You can access the dungeons from the Terminal after reaching Ginza.

70050000025847.name: Shin Megami Tensei BGM Pack
70050000025847.description:
Includes BGM tracks from various games in the "Shin Megami Tensei" series to use on the  map and during battle in the Vortex World. Change anytime from the Config menu.
*Available after reaching the Vortex World.

70050000025848.name: Merciful Difficulty
70050000025848.description:
Adds the MERCIFUL difficulty.
Suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story.
Selectable at New Game. Also changeable at any time from the Config menu.

70050000025978.name: Tennis World Tour 2 - Champions Pack
70050000025978.description:
The CHAMPIONS pack includes:
- The ATP Cup
- 6 additional players: Andy Murray, Donna Vekic, Marin Cilic, Justine Henin, Maria Sharapova and Diego Schwartzman
- 4 additional stadiums in London and Melbourne
- Extra official outfits and equipment

70050000025981.name: Mythical Wild Animals Pack
70050000025981.description: Not just in fairy tales! Chocolate mint tigers and lava rabbits are just two of the 10 fanciful wild animals you will unlock in the Mythical Wild Animals Pack!

70050000025990.name: Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2 - Digital Deluxe Content
70050000025990.intro: Drop back in with the most iconic skateboarding games ever made.
70050000025990.description:
Includes:

- ‘The Ripper’ character from Powell-Peralta® - the iconic skeleton makes its debut in Tony Hawk's™ Pro Skater™ and comes with its own secret tricks and boards
- Unique retro 80s-era outfits for Tony Hawk, Steve Caballero and Rodney Mullen
- Unique retro content for the Create-A-Skater mode - boards, clothes, shoes and gear

70050000026002.name: Wave 1 – Pulse of the Ancients
70050000026002.description:
New playable character: Battle-Tested Guardian
Unleash the power of the Battle-Tested Guardian on the forces of Calamity Ganon.

New weapon types: Flail for Link and Master Cycle for Zelda
Try out some additional weapon types! These unique combat styles will come in handy in the new challenges you'll face.

New location: Royal Ancient Tech Lab
Stop by the Royal Ancient Tech Lab to test yourself with new challenges to unlock weapons and other helpful features!

Even more updates!
Test your skills against newly-added enemies like the bomb-throwing Moblin and a Giant Chuchu. You can also take on a gauntlet of foes in the new 'vicious monster' boss battles, try out the Apocalyptic difficulty level and more!

70050000026003.name: Wave 2 (Available November 2021)
70050000026003.description:
New character vignettes
Newly-added stages
Expanded roster
New battle skills for existing characters

70050000026090.name: Shining-Gold Super Winner outfit for Nitro
70050000026090.description:
Long ago, when he was still in his early adulthood, Nitro spent his days doing odd jobs that needed muscle. One of these stints was fighting in the local wrestling league. In his biggest match to date he accidentally pulled off the mask of his opponent and an opportunistic thief made off with it mid-match. Nitro immediately stopped fighting and vowed to continue the fight only when he returned it. And he left and never returned. Some say he is still looking for the mask to finish that legendary match.

- The Shining-Gold Super Winner colorway. A golden champion's outfit.
- The Revenge Ultimatum Lucha colorway. A hellish red look.

70050000026199.name: DRAGON BALL XENOVERSE 2 - Legendary Pack 2
70050000026199.description:
In addition to Pikkon and Toppo (God of Destruction) in Legendary Pack 1, you are on board for a lot of new content including additional Characters, Parallel Quests, Super Souls, Costumes and a lot more!

■Legendary Pack 2
*Legendary Pack 2 will be released by December 31, 2021.
・New characters/Parallel Quests/moves/costumes and more.　
Stay tuned for more information to be announced.

70050000026234.name: SnowRunner - Navistar 5000-MV Tractor
70050000026234.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with the Navistar 5000-MV tractor!

This Heavy Equipment Transport Truck is a powerful hauler that was used to transport tanks and other military equipment across dangerous and uneven terrain.

70050000026235.name: SnowRunner - Derry Longhorn 4520 Sabertooth Livery
70050000026235.description: Customize your SnowRunner experience with the Sabertooth Livery DLC, available exclusively for the Heavy Duty Derry Longhorn 4520!

70050000026236.name: SnowRunner - High Roller Pack
70050000026236.description:
Expand your driving roster with the High Roller pack, giving you the Khan 39 Scout truck and its alternate High Roller skin. 

The nimble Khan 39 Scout is a versatile Russian climber with both All-Wheel-Drive and Differential Lock capabilities.

This DLC is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026237.name: SnowRunner - Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap
70050000026237.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience with the unique Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap skin for the White Western Star 4964. 

The Loaded Dice Vinyl Wrap adds a set of flaming smoke-trailed dice to the side of your White Western Star 4964.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026238.name: SnowRunner - Scorched Vinyl Wrap
70050000026238.description:
Explore SnowRunner in style with the unique Scorched Vinyl Wrap for the Chevrolet CK 1500. 

The Scorched Vinyl Wrap adds a fiery burst look to the Chevrolet CK 1500.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026239.name: SnowRunner - True Colors Vinyl Wrap
70050000026239.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience with the unique True Colors Vinyl Wrap for the Chevrolet Kodiak C70. 

The True Colors Vinyl Wrap gives an American themed skin to the Chevrolet Kodiak C70.

This custom skin is included for all Year 1 Pass owners.

70050000026240.name: SnowRunner - Season 1: Search & Recover
70050000026240.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 1: Search & Recover to discover a wealth of new challenges. This DLC gives you access to two brand new maps in Russia’s Kola Peninsula alongside new vehicles, missions, skins, and more! 

Delivered via three updates over the summer of 2020, Season 1: Search & Recover can also be purchased as part of the SnowRunner Year 1 Pass.

Season 1: Search & Recover includes:
• Two new winter maps in Russia’s Kola Peninsula, taking you on a modern-day treasure hunt for the remnants of a WWII bomber. 
• New vehicles, including the TUZ 16 “Actaeon”, and the Ford 750 4x4 CrewCab 
• New vehicle skins and interior cosmetics.

70050000026241.name: SnowRunner - Season 2: Explore & Expand
70050000026241.description:
Take your SnowRunner experience to wild territories in Season 2: Explore & Expand, with two freezing maps in Yukon, Canada, three new vehicles, exclusive vehicle skins and a unique objective!

The Season 2: Explore & Expand DLC is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase. 

Season 2: Explore & Expand includes:
• Two new winter maps set in Yukon, Canada with brand new open-ended mission types: Scour the maps to locate resources and structures to disassemble, before crafting and delivering materials to build a huge, multi-part processing plant.
• New vehicles including the CAT 770G, the CAT TH357D AG, and the KRS 58 “Bandit”.
• New vehicle skins for the International Harvester Scout 800, the International Loadstar and more.

70050000026242.name: SnowRunner - Season 3: Locate & Deliver
70050000026242.description:
Expand your SnowRunner experience with Season 3: Locate & Deliver. Haul giant logs and bring old railways to life in the remote wilderness of Wisconsin, USA. Enjoy two huge maps in Wisconsin, three new vehicles, exclusive skins, unique missions, specialized logging addons, and more!

The Season 3: Locate & Deliver DLC is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase.

Season 3: Locate & Deliver includes:
• Two new summer maps in Wisconsin, USA, with the much-anticipated arrival of logging! Use the new grapples to load logs, rebuild train tracks, and power abandoned facilities in the deep wilds.
• Three new vehicles including the International PayStar Twin Steer, the Pacific P512 PF, and the BOAR 45318.
• New cosmetics, including three vehicle skins, and new stickers.
• New addons to load and carry logs, and a generator trailer to power facilities.

70050000026243.name: SnowRunner - Season 4: New Frontiers
70050000026243.description:
Elevate your SnowRunner experience to new heights with the New Frontiers expansion, the game’s biggest and most ambitious addition, and the last installment of the Year 1 Pass. 

Rebuild roads, fuel lines, and various buildings to bring an old soviet rocket launchpad back to life in Amur Oblast, a huge new winter region with four 4km² maps. Using powerful new vehicles, haul the massive rocket to the launch pad yourself.

The New Frontiers expansion is available as part of the Year 1 Pass and Premium Edition, or as a standalone purchase.

New Frontiers includes:
· A new primary objective adding hours of gameplay through new missions to rebuild an old soviet rocket launchpad
· Four large maps in Amur Oblast, a new Russian winter region.
· Two new vehicles, including the ZiKZ 605-R, and the Khan 317 Sentinel scout vehicle.
· New addons
· New exclusive skins and cosmetics, including vehicle skins and stickers.

70050000026244.name: SnowRunner - Western Star 49X
70050000026244.description:
Tear up the dirt with The All New Western Star 49X, an additional vehicle for SnowRunner!

This modern heavy duty truck is a beast off the road and is no stranger to the mud. With its controllable extra axle, the 49X can navigate the worst road conditions while carrying all but the heaviest loads.

The Western Star 49X is not included in the Year 1  Pass or the Year 2 Pass.

70050000026245.name: SnowRunner - Clasico Pack
70050000026245.description:
Tear up the frontier with the Clasico Pack, granting you a new vehicle, the ferocious Chevrolet Apache 6x6, and its blazing blue alternate skin. 

This classic six-wheeled pickup can conquer all kinds of dangerous terrain, excelling at deep mud and water thanks to its unique weight distribution and sizeable fuel tank.

This DLC is not included in the Year 1 Pass or the Year 2 Pass.

70050000026283.name: FIGHTING EX LAYER ANOTHER DASH Full Package
70050000026283.description:
The following features will be unlocked after purchasing the "Fighting EX Layer Another Dash Full Package".

■Training Mode, Rank Match (Online VS), and Casual Match (Online VS) will be implemented.
■14 characters will be added.
■All character colors will be available to use.
■Spectator Mode (Online VS) will be implemented with the update scheduled for June.

70050000026317.name: SAMURAI SHODOWN DLC "AMAKUSA SHIRO TOKISADA"
70050000026317.description: This digital purchase will unlock the DLC character "AMAKUSA SHIRO TOKISADA" for your copy of SAMURAI SHODOWN.

70050000026442.name: SUPER BOMBERMAN R ONLINE Premium Pack
70050000026442.description:
This Add-On pack contains 14 additional characters equipped with special types and abilities, as well as the feature to create private matches with your friends.

Characters included in this bundle:
Attack Type
・Simon Belmont Bomber from Castlevania
・Pyramid Head Bomber from Silent Hill
・Raiden Bomber from Metal Gear Solid

Speed Type
・Alucard Bomber from Castlevania
・Vic Viper Bomber from Gradius
・Bill Bomber from Contra
・Lance Bomber from Contra
・Naked Snake Bomber from Metal Gear Solid
・Richter Bomber from Castlevania

Unique Type
・Bubble Head Bomber from Silent Hill
・Princess Tomato Bomber from Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom
・Mimi Bomber from Pop'n Music
・Nyami Bomber from Pop'n Music
・Robbie the Rabbit Bomber from Silent Hill

70050000026647.name: Anthrax - "Among The Living"
70050000026647.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Among The Living' by Anthrax! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026648.name: The Offspring - "Self Esteem"
70050000026648.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Self Esteem' by The Offspring! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026661.name: MY HERO ONE'S JUSTICE 2 Celebration Wear Set
70050000026661.description:
Players will be able to use Celebration Wear outfits for the following 9 characters: Izuku Midoriya & Shoot Style, Katsuki Bakugo, Ochaco Uraraka, Shoto Todoroki, Eijiro Kirishima, Kyoka Jiro, All Might, and Shota Aizawa.
This pack also includes 10 color variations for each outfit.

Contents:
- Celebration Wear outfits for Izuku Midoriya & Shoot Style, Katsuki Bakugo, Ochaco Uraraka, Shoto Todoroki, Eijiro Kirishima, Kyoka Jiro, All Might, and Shota Aizawa
- 10 outfit Color Variations for each Celebration Wear outfit

70050000026690.name: Hidden Through Time - Road to Rome
70050000026690.intro: This DLC includes ten new levels ranging from Gaul settlements to the monumental Colosseum! It also features more than 300 new Roman Empire themed objects and characters.
70050000026690.description:
The Roman Empire – an ancient empire, centered on the city of Rome. Not only known for their ruthless conquering of the world, but also for their amazing architecture, intriguing mythology and powerful emperors. 
In Hidden Through Time – Roads to Rome you will accompany Clicky on his adventure through the streets of Rome! Hear the roar of the arena, march into battle with the troops and earn the favor of the gods! Observe your surroundings with care and discover the secrets hidden in plain sight.
This DLC includes ten new levels ranging from Gaul settlements to the monumental Colosseum! It also features more than 300 new Roman Empire themed objects and characters, which will be in the level editor upon purchase!
People who don’t own this DLC will still be able to play through user created maps that use objects from the Roads to Rome DLC.
Recline in your comfortable lectus, grab an amphora of your favorite drink and prepare to make yourself comfortable. 
After all, Rome wasn’t built in a day.

70050000026728.name: Worms Rumble - Legends Pack
70050000026728.description:
Celebrate 25 years of Worms icons with the Legends Pack! Customise your Worm with these awesome outfits, weapon skins and banners.

This pack includes:
6 Outfits – Retro Commando, Sheep, Donkey, Skunk, Cow and Pigeon (each with 3 different colour variants!)
6 Weapon Skins - Retro, Wooly, Concrete, Poison, Bovine, Feathers
6 Banners

70050000026731.name: Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Deluxe Kit
70050000026731.intro: Enhance your experience with this add-on content!
70050000026731.description:
This kit contains a variety of additional content to enhance your experience with the game.

 ・ Ena's Outfit: Kuan Coat
 ・ Rider's Layered Armor: Razewing Armor Alpha ＆ Beta
 ・ Rider's Hairstyle: Spiky Nergal
 ・ Navirou's Outfits: Nergigante and Pukei-Pukei Costumes
 ・ Sticker Sets: Adventure Buddies 2 & 3

Note: This is the same additional content included in Monster Hunter Stories 2: Wings of Ruin Deluxe Edition. Some content will only become useable after progressing through the game.

70050000026732.name: Ena's Outfit: Kamura Maiden Outfit
70050000026732.intro: Enhance your experience with this add-on content!
70050000026732.description:
This outfit lets you dress Ena as a hub maiden from Kamura village, as featured in the Monster Hunter series!

Note: This content will only become useable after progressing through the game. Outfits can be changed from the box in your room in the game.

70050000026738.name: Réussir : Code de la Route Spécial Moto (French Highway Code)
70050000026738.intro: Find the French Highway Code in this special version for motorbikes!
70050000026738.description:
Rediscover the French Highway Code in its version dedicated to motorbike licences! Find the training and exam sessions in a playful form and challenge your friends in a new minigame! 

• The multiplayer mode is still there: up to 4 players, challenge your friends locally or online! 

• 1,800 questions/answers fully voiced in French, covering every official topic.

• Track your progress with the personalized training path. Check your results, work on your weaknesses with the thematic series and unlock trophies for your achievements!

• Full compliance with the new French Highway Code reform, featuring an Exam Mode recreating the exact conditions of the real exam. All content created by licensed road safety specialists.

• As a bonus, find 40 questions about scooter safety!

70050000026741.name: Hot Wheels™ Booster Pack
70050000026741.intro: Boost your game with seven legendary Hot Wheels cars, four exciting new racetracks and adrenaline-pumping stunt challenges.
70050000026741.description:
Turbocharge your game with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack, an exciting new content expansion for Beach Buggy Racing 2: Island Adventure.

The Booster Pack adds seven legendary Hot Wheels cars to the Beach Buggy Racing League, including Rip Rod™, Bone Shaker™, Surf 'N Turf™, and Twin Mill™ III.  You'll also get four new race environments filled with looping orange Hot Wheels track and exciting set pieces like Volcano Blast and Hot Wheels Harbor. 

Ready for a challenge? See if you can collect the 27 Hot Wheels Stunt Challenge Medallions placed throughout the 1000HP race tracks.

Bring the thrill of Hot Wheels cars and tracks to Beach Buggy Racing 2 with the Hot Wheels Booster Pack.  Challenge accepted!

70050000026749.name: J. Cole - "No Role Modelz"
70050000026749.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'No Role Modelz' by J. Cole! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026750.name: Some Lover - "Days Ahead, Days Behind"
70050000026750.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Days Ahead, Days Behind' by Some Lover! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026751.name: Billie Eilish - "Therefore I Am"
70050000026751.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Therefore I Am' by Billie Eilish! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026752.name: Disclosure ft. Sam Smith - "Latch"
70050000026752.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Latch' by Disclosure ft. Sam Smith! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026756.name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Storm Ground - Spoils of War Weapon Pack
70050000026756.description:
Expand your Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Storm Ground experience with the Spoils of War Weapon Pack and receive three new legendary weapons for each faction to enhance your armies.

The Spoils of War Weapon Pack includes:
• The Everspoil, a Maggotkin axe
• The Shatterer’s Second, a Stormcast hammer
• The Harvester of Grief, a Nighthaunt scythe

Each weapon can be equipped by the heroes of its faction.

70050000026810.name: Worms Rumble - Armageddon Weapon Skin Pack
70050000026810.description:
Customise any of your weapons with these Legendary skins inspired by the smash-hit classic Worms Armageddon!

This pack includes:
Cheese Weapon Skin
Brimstone Weapon Skin
Forest Weapon Skin
Sports Weapon Skin
Manhattan Weapon Skin

70050000026811.name: Worms Rumble - Action All-Stars Pack
70050000026811.description:
Jump into the fight with your favourite action hero! Whether you’re bold, cunning, or wise, the Action All-Stars Pack has you covered.

This pack includes:
3 Outfits – Superhero, Wizard and Ninja (each with 3 different colour variants!)
3 Weapon Skins (Heroic, Magical and Cherry Blossom)
3 Emotes
3 Titles
3 Banners

70050000026812.name: Worms Rumble - Emote Pack
70050000026812.description:
Flex on your friends and foes alike with the Worms Rumble: Emote Pack!

This pack includes:
Tea Bag Emote
Disco Emote
Juggling Emote
Make It Rain Emote
Kick Ups Emote
Selfie Emote
Violin Emote
Goodbye! Emote

70050000026813.name: Worms Rumble - Captain & Shark Double Pack
70050000026813.description:
Just when you thought it was safe to go back in the arena… Land the Captain and Shark Double Pack today to receive new outfits, weapon skins, titles, banners and emotes to use on the battlefield in salty style!

This pack includes:
• Captain outfit (3 colour variants)
• Shark outfit (3 colour variants)
• 2 Emotes: Land Ahoy and Swimming
• 2 Weapon Skins: Treasure Map and Shark Infested
• 2 Banners: Ship and Shark
• 2 Titles: “Salty Seadog” and “Shark Bait”

70050000026814.name: Worms Rumble - Cats & Dogs Double Pack
70050000026814.description:
To celebrate the arrival of Team Deathmatch, we’re introducing the longest-standing rivalry in history, Cats vs Dogs!
Are you Team Cat or Team Dog?

This pack includes:
• Cat Outfit x 3
• Dog Outfit x 3
• Cat Banner
• Dog Banner
• Kitty Weapon Skin
• Bones Weapon Skin
• Nine Lives Title
• Good Boy Title
• Meow Emote
• Panting Emote

70050000026815.name: Worms Rumble - Honor & Death Pack
70050000026815.description:
Rekindle your hunger for battle and glory with the Honor and Death Pack.
As the forces of good and evil clash, where will you swear allegiance?

This pack includes:
• Hero Knight Outfit x 3
• Death Knight Outfit x 3
• Righteous Banner
• Corrupted Banner
• Righteous Weapon Skin
• Corrupted Weapon Skin
• King’s Champion Title
• King Slayer Title
• Sword Stance Emote
• Axe Wield Emote

70050000026816.name: Worms Rumble - Bank Heist Double Pack
70050000026816.description:
Tool up with the Bank Heist Double Pack! Equipping you with outfits, emotes, banners and weapon skins to pull the ultimate bank job.

This pack includes:
Robber Outfit x 3 (Red Panda, Lemur & Racoon)
Henchman Outfit x 3 (White Mask, Gold Mask and Stripe Mask)
Graffiti Banner
Vault Banner
Mastermind Title
Smooth Operator Title
Taunt Emote
Finger Guns Emote
Jackpot Weapon Skin
Graffiti Weapon Skin

70050000026850.name: SnowRunner - Anniversary DLC
70050000026850.description:
Celebrate SnowRunner’s first anniversary with the Anniversary DLC and receive two new trucks for free! The CAT 681 and International HX 520 give you all new options for adventuring across the harsh landscapes of SnowRunner, and look good doing it.

The CAT 681 is a robust, all-terrain heavyweight with plenty of storage space and the power to make it across even the harshest of maps. With a sturdy construction it’s less prone to breakage than other trucks.

The International HX 520 can attach to any number of large trailers and is perfect for hauling cargo across the most intense terrain. It joins a fleet of more than 40 others in giving you every option for conquering the wilderness.

70050000026851.name: SnowRunner - Tatra Dual Pack
70050000026851.description:
Expand and bring even more versatility to your SnowRunner fleet with the TATRA Dual Pack, giving you access to the iconic TATRA 813 and TATRA 805!

The TATRA Dual Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000026852.name: SnowRunner - Season 5: Build & Dispatch
70050000026852.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000026853.name: SnowRunner - Season 6: Haul & Hustle
70050000026853.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000026854.name: SnowRunner - Season 7: Compete & Conquer
70050000026854.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000026855.name: SnowRunner - Season 8: New Expansion
70050000026855.description: Expand your SnowRunner experience with this new DLC.

70050000026856.name: SnowRunner - GMC Brigadier
70050000026856.description:
Expand your SnowRunner garage further with the GMC Brigadier DLC, bringing you the brawny GMC Brigadier as well as an exclusive alternate skin. This gas-guzzling juggernaut, upgradable with all-wheel drive and differential lock, will provide extraordinary power and torque to your most daunting missions! 

The GMC Brigadier DLC is not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

70050000026857.name: SnowRunner - Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack
70050000026857.description:
Customize your SnowRunner experience further with the Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack, adding four exclusive skins for the Azov 5319, Azov 73210, YAR 87 and Voron AE-4380! 

The Burning Bright Vinyl Wrap Pack is included for all Year 2 Pass owners.

70050000026921.name: Hit Song + VTuber Pack 2
70050000026921.intro: A new pack featuring 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!
70050000026921.description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars from J-POP, ANIME, VTuber!

This pack includes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
・Hare Hare Yukai / Aya Hirano, Minori Chihara, Yuko Goto / TVAnimation「The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya」ED
・Connect -TV MIX- / ClariS / TVAnimation「Puella Magi Madoka Magica」OP
・DreamRiser / ChouCho / TV animation「GIRLS und PANZER」OP
・Moonlight / Yorushika
・Usseewa / Ado
・Kaikai Kitan / Eve / TV Anime "JUJUTSU KAISEN" Cour 1 Opening Theme
・Mr.VIRTUALIZER / HIMEHINA
・Excuse My Rudeness, But Could You Please RIP? / Calliope Mori
・HINOTORI / Takanashi Kiara
・???(Secret)

■Navigator
・Hime Tanaka(Mr.VIRTUALIZER) *with voice
・Hina Suzuki(Mr.VIRTUALIZER) *with voice

■Avatar
・HIME(Mr.VIRTUALIZER, 2D)
・HINA(Mr.VIRTUALIZER, 2D)
・Calliope Mori(2D)
・Kiara Takanashi(2D)

*Some content will be unlocked via missions after downloading.

70050000026945.name: Retrograde Arena - Arms Race Pack
70050000026945.intro: Arms Race DLC includes Arms Race game mode and six maps.
70050000026945.description:
Increase your level and Upgrade your weapon by eliminating enemies. Win the match by being the first player to get a kill with the last weapon. There are UNLIMITED BULLETS for all weapons You'll respawn immediately after dying and get back to the action quick. A super-duper skill game mode that requires fast thinking and reflex.

◆The DLC Includes:
1. Arms Race game mode
2. Arms Race maps:
• Cross-Bounce: A claustrophobic map with short range and long-range battles.
• Bouncy Barriers: Symmetrical map where no place is safe!
• Inner Sanctum: Small map that will force Close Quarter Shootouts.
• Asterisk Arena: Maps with a lot of shortcuts for unlimited play dynamics!
3. Arms Race converted maps:
• Prototype Arena
• X Arena

◆Extra Maps:
1. King’s Crown map:
• Museum: Arena that forces you, the player to fight close up and personal
2. Supersizer map:
• Gladiator Arena: Different weapons, different strategy each round!

◆FAQ
1. What makes this different than deathmatch?
- Unlimited bullets and you will change weapons after certain number of eliminations

2. Why do the time limit change?
- The time limit change according to the number of players in the match.

3. My friends don't own the DLC, can they join this mode?
- Anyone can join the mode as long as the game host own the Arms Race DLC

70050000026946.name: Retrograde Arena - Supporter Pack
70050000026946.description:
Exclusive skins for our supporters. If you love the game and want to support us, you'll get Neon swag to showcase in the arena.

This DLC includes :
• 11 Exclusive Skins
• 2 Particle Effects
• 2 Fancy Thruster ($$$/¥¥¥)

70050000026966.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Friday I'm In Love' by The Cure! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026968.name: Dirty Vegas - "Days Go By"
70050000026968.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Days Go By' by Dirty Vegas! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026969.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'What Is Love' by Haddaway! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000026985.name: AFL Evolution 2 Season Pack 2021
70050000026985.description:
AFL Evolution 2 Season Pack 2021 brings all the action from the 2021 Toyota AFL Premiership Season including:
•	Cazalys Stadium

•	Take on the Team of the Week for every round of the 2021 AFL season

70050000027008.name: Knockout City™ Standard Edition
70050000027008.intro: Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to glory!
70050000027008.description:
Team up and duke it out with rival Crews in Knockout City*, where you settle the score with EPIC DODGEBALL BATTLES. Brace yourself for outrageous fun and intense competition in an all-new take on team-based multiplayer games. 

Customize your character and form a Crew with friends to start your Knockout City takeover. Knock out opponents with trick shots and coordinated teamwork while dodging and catching balls flying across the map. No ball? No problem! You can literally ball up, roll into a teammate’s hands, and become the ultimate weapon! 

A variety of outlandish ball types, locations, and game modes keep it exciting. Plus, each season introduces new maps, ball types, rewards, events, and challenges! Throw, catch, pass, dodge, and tackle your way to dodgeball dominance!

KEY FEATURES:
•  Frantic and Fun — Rule the city through lightning-fast multiplayer matches featuring mind-blowing dodgeball mechanics. Increase your attack by passing to power up dodgeballs, targeting your opponents with a variety of specialized balls, or “balling up” at any time to get thrown by teammates! 

•  Crew Up — Assemble an All-Star dodgeball Crew with your friends for multiplayer matches in a seamless cross-play experience! Together, knock out opponents in 3v3, 4v4, or free-for-all matches. Pass, throw, and strategize to dominate as a team and unlock distinctive, Crew-only rewards! 

•  Define Your Style — Show off your status and unique look through character and Crew designs with expansive character creation options. Customize your appearance, gear, and attitude, from body type and hairstyle to a custom glider and Crew vehicle to win, lose, and taunt animations. 

•  Take On Knockout City — Battle it out with other Crews across dynamic maps all over the city. Each map’s special features make every match an intense, unexpected experience. Dodgeball thrives in back alleys with pneumatic tubes, on skyscraper rooftops, across busy streets—and even at the local burger joint and construction sites. While you’re dodging dodgeballs, watch out for moving cars, rooftop drops, and even a wrecking ball or two. 

•  Strikingly Fresh Yet Familiar — It’s easy to pick up and play thanks to familiar controls, but practice is key to becoming a champion. On a level playing field, only the most skilled ballers stand out from the crowd. Use your knowledge to master the intricacies of the game for spectacular KOs.

70050000027032.name: Toriko's Care Package
70050000027032.description: Adds new features such as a wardrobe for Toriko, new interactions, diseases, and more.

70050000027034.name: Knockout City™ Deluxe Upgrade
70050000027034.intro: Take your game from basic to Epic with the Deluxe Upgrade!
70050000027034.description:
Take your game from basic to Epic and achieve dodgeball dominance in style with the Knockout City™ Deluxe Upgrade*! The Deluxe Upgrade includes: 

•  1 exclusive Epic outfit
•  1 exclusive Epic Crew vehicle
•  3 exclusive Epic Crew logos
•  3 exclusive Epic Crew banners
•  1,000 Holobux**

70050000027040.name: Side Story Pack Yukari Arc
70050000027040.intro: Side Story Pack 3 is the Yukari Arc!
70050000027040.description:
Side Story Pack, vol. 3!
The title is, "The Education of Spell Bubble - Yukari's Counterattack"!

■Plot:
Yukari was not amused by Spell Bubble’s popularity in Gensokyo. So, in order to put restrictions on it, she came up with a surprising plan!

This is the story of how Gensokyo and Yukari came to accept Spell Bubble, in spite of some initial prejudices.

■New Music
・Slicing Netherworld Boundaries / Diao ye zong
・Zangetsu Aria / Kishida Kyoudan & The Akeboshi Rockets
・DOWN DOWN DOLL / Akatsuki Records

* Songs can be played by clearing the corresponding stages.

■Stages
The side story is broken up into 5 stages
where you can battle against different oppnonents.
There’s also three difficulty levels to choose from.

・Stage 1: Yuyuko Saigyoji
  (Slicing Netherworld Boundaries)
・Stage 2: Satori Komeiji (Sadistic Paranoia)
・Stage 3: Youmu Konpaku (Zangetsu Aria)
・Stage 4: Tenshi Hinanai (Ecstatic Dreamers)
・Stage 5: Alice Margatroid (DOWN DOWN DOLL)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after pack is purchased in order to use it.

70050000027075.name: Additional Art & Music from the Vaults
70050000027075.intro: Enjoy an additional 25 pieces of art and 29 music tracks with comments from the creators.
70050000027075.description:
Early purchasers will also receive the "From the Vault" bonus content, featuring an additional 25 pieces of art and 29 music tracks that you can enjoy at any time from within the game.

Each amazing piece includes a unique comment by its creator, giving you even more insight into the world of The Great Ace Attorney.

Note: This bonus may be sold separately in the future. You must purchase the main game on or before August 31, 2021 to receive this bonus.

70050000027109.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Original Blue Swimsuit
70050000027109.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is joining the EDF, appearing in her Original Blue Swimsuit. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

70050000027133.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Classic Hostess Costume
70050000027133.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. With her Classic Hostess Costume, she also comes equipped with a pure heart.

70050000027134.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Merry Santa Costume
70050000027134.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF. And what's more, she's appearing in her Deluxe Edition early purchase limited edition Santa Costume. She also comes equipped with an exclusive weapon available only with this content.

70050000027135.name: Ranger (EDF5), Sergeant Colors & Special Gear
70050000027135.description: The "Sergeant" is the reliable leader who allowed the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 5" to reach his full potential. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Ranger that uses the Sergeant's colors. Furthermore, he comes equipped with a certain weapon that comes to mind when you think of the Sergeant. Now you can lead both your team and the planet to safety as if you were the Sergeant himself. Just be aware that the actual Sergeant character does not appear in the game.

70050000027136.name: Fencer (EDF5), Grim Reaper Colors & Special Gear
70050000027136.description: The Grim Reapers were the elite fencers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They were a dependable force that often aided (and at times were aided by) the protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Fencer that uses the Grim Reaper's colors. He of course comes equipped with a Blasthole Spear for his weapon. Now, charge into the enemy as if staring death straight in the eyes.

70050000027137.name: Wing Diver (EDF5), Spriggan Colors & Special Gear
70050000027137.description: The Spriggans were the elite wing divers that appeared in "Earth Defense Force 5." They are a group of flying Amazons who often joined the protagonist's missions. Along with the Grim Reapers, the Spriggans, and their strong-minded and confident leader, are popular NPCs. This allows you to play as an EDF5 Wing Diver that uses these sassy sisters' colors. She of course comes equipped with a Mag Blaster for her weapon. Now, head to the battle as an Amazon to teach those aliens to fear the EDF.

70050000027138.name: Ranger (EDF4), Omega Team Colors & Special Gear
70050000027138.description: The Omega Team is a group of elite rangers who appeared in the world of "Earth Defense Force 2025" and "Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair," known for their flashy colors and high-output lasers. They are stalwart NPCs whose weapons sometimes outpower the EDF4 protagonist. This allows you to play as an EDF4 Ranger using the Omega Team colors. And for his weapon? Well, that goes without saying. Now, let the enemies enjoy the sweet taste of laser.

70050000027139.name: Prowl Rider (EDF: IR), KR Prototype & Special Gear
70050000027139.description: In the world of "Earth Defense Force: Iron Rain," the Kindred Rebellion ceded from the EDF and developed their own experimental Prowl Rider PA-Gear. While the EDF's Prowl Rider technology took the lead and the Rebellion's version of the gear came to be known as a "prototype," its specs are comparable to the EDF's official gear. This allows you to use the Kindred Rebellion's version of the Prowl Rider, equipped with a special weapon. Now, go and prove that the Rebellion's technology is a force to be reckoned with.

70050000027140.name: Infantry (EDF3), Storm 1 Colors & Special Gear
70050000027140.description: This allows you to play as an EDF3 Infantry using the colors of Storm 1, the legendary soldier who was the protagonist of "Earth Defense Force 2017" and "Earth Defense Force 2017 Portable," equipped with a special weapon. Those who enlisted early can use this to fight while feeling like a legend. Now, go and save our Earth!

70050000027141.name: The Legendary Mr. Y, Reborn as "Mecha Yuki" After His Acid Incident!?
70050000027141.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

There was once a soldier who defended the Earth valiantly against the Invaders until he was defeated. Half of his body was covered in lethal acid before he spoke his final word. Who was this word meant for? His family? A friend? Or perhaps, a lover? No...he must have been speaking to the soldiers entrusted with the fate of the Earth. But this was in another world, on a round planet. In this square Earth, he has returned to the battlefield, the majority of his body now mechanized using the latest technology. And in his hand? An Acid Gun...

70050000027142.name: Hostess Setsu from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027142.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. The rambunctious Setsu (or "Setsu-Chan") is known as the "fierce tiger" of Dream Club. She boiled with rage on hearing the planet is in trouble, and jumped at the opportunity to help. For her Ability, she sets up a bear-shaped power spot which further amplifies her fighting spirit. For her SP Move, she freezes the enemies by making a brisk snow fall from above. Her unlikely weapon is a portable railgun that needs to be charged to fire. Though it may not seem so at first, this is truly pure power to the extreme.

70050000027143.name: Hostess Mian from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027143.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. The most aloof hostess at Dream Club, Mian appears to have reluctantly agreed to help defend the Earth. Always depending on others, for her Ability she sets down an automated laser turret, and for her SP Move she requests an explosive shooting star attack. For her weapon, she uses a devastating laser cannon that appeared in the EDF: IR world. The longer you fire it, the stronger it gets, and at maximum output it can deliver some ruinous results. Now, THIS is pure power.

70050000027144.name: Hostess ILI from Dream Club, Giving the EDF a Try!?
70050000027144.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

This hostess was chosen to join the fight from "Dream Club," a club for adults that can only be joined by those with a pure heart. ILI, an autonomous android who for some reason works at Dream Club, apparently wants to prove her true potential by saving the Earth. Despite being an android, performance-wise she is comparable to a human. With her innocent heart (AI?), she would never shoot beams from her eyes, or do anything of that sort. But hoping to find batteries, she was coaxed into joining the EDF and modded into a tool of destruction: for her Ability she can float in midair, and for her SP Move she causes javelins to rain from the sky. Although she really only needs manganese batteries to function, for her weapon she's been equipped with a massive automatic shotgun paired with a reflector shield. Now, THIS is pure power.

70050000027145.name: Aya, the Calm Big Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
70050000027145.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

Aya, the calm and composed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," has joined the fight, wearing not only her trademark 10-gallon hat and bikini, but also with a katana as her weapon. Usually focused on exterminating zombies, she has decided to break from her normal routine and use her sword-wielding expertise to help save the Earth. She may appear less "herself" here compared to her appearance in the "round" world, but that's to be expected in a world without curves. For her SP Move, she unleashes her powerful "Xtasy Combination," which feels as good as the name suggests when it hits.

70050000027146.name: Saki, the Crazed Little Sister Swordswoman from "OneeChanbara"
70050000027146.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

Saki, the crazed swordswoman from the zombie-infested world of "OneeChanbara," is here and ready to fight using her super long katana and acrobatics. Like her big sister Aya, she usually spends her time exterminating zombies, but she couldn't sit idly by while the Earth was in pieces. She may appear less "herself" here compared to her appearance in the "round" world, but that's to be expected in a world without curves. For her SP Move, she uses her family's Baneful blood to temporarily boost her attack power and become invincible. Now, THIS is truly Baneful power.

70050000027147.name: Colonist: "We'll Help, If It Means Saving the Planet"!?
70050000027147.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

The Colonists who invaded the planet in "Earth Defense Force 5" have rushed to join the fight. Why would a previous enemy join the EDF in defending the Earth? The answer to that question will be clear when you reach the end of this game, so we wouldn't want to put any spoilers here. Let's just say that yesterday's foes are today's friends. And they look just like us humans! (Ribbit.) Anyway, let's put aside our differences for now and fight together!

70050000027148.name: Cosmonaut: "We'll Take the Planet As Is"!
70050000027148.description:
This allows you to use a special character and that character's weapon.

The Cosmonauts who had invaded the planet in "Earth Defense Force 5" have rushed to join the fight. Why would a previous enemy join the EDF in defending the Earth? The answer to that question will be clear when you reach the end of this game, so we wouldn't want to put any spoilers here. Let's just say that yesterday's foes are today's friends. They don't bear the slightest resemblance to us humans, but there's nothing more beautiful than mutual understanding. Isn't it heartwarming when former enemies join forces to defeat a shared threat?

70050000027149.name: Collector's Set of Various Character Versions
70050000027149.description:
Special characters and the weapons owned by those characters can be obtained.

For all the collectors out there, there is a batch of five equipment update versions for the special characters associated with EDF.

Ranger (EDF5) Sergeant Colors & Special Gear Ver. 1.01
Fencer (EDF5) Grim Reaper Colors & Special Gear Ver. 1.01
Wing Diver (EDF5) Spriggan Colors & Special Gear Ver.1.01
Ranger (EDF4) Omega Team Colors & Special Gear Ver. 1.01
Prowl Rider (EDFIR) KR Prototype & Special Gear Ver.1.01

70050000027150.name: Additional Mission Pack: Another ResCUBE
70050000027150.description:
This is an additional mission pack featuring new enemies that do not appear in the base game.

Contains over 10 advanced missions designed for elite soldiers. That long-awaited creepy-crawly enemy that EDF enlistees were waiting for is finally here. These missions are pretty tough, so be sure you've built enough confidence and have completed missions in the base game on a high difficulty level before attempting. Also contains new weapons.

-Another ResCUBE: Prologue-

In 2020, Dark Tyrant and 6 Motherships began an attack on the Earth.

The Motherships all attacked at once, and tore the planet into pieces.

After an intense battle, the Brothers & Sisters, led by the Commander, successfully defeated Dark Tyrant.

The planet was restored, but the EDF's work was not done yet. They continued battling the invading forces in each of their native lands.

But then... 

Something happened.

In 2021, another disaster occurred. A distress call was received from the UK. Many never-before-seen enemies emerged.

And once again, the planet was torn apart...

70050000027151.name: Additional Character: Riho Futaba, Cool Summer Outfit
70050000027151.description: Riho Futaba (voiced by Yuko Goto), a virtual idol who has appeared in numerous video games including the "Dream Club" series, is now joining the EDF as a playable character. Her Cool Summer Outfit allows her to stay cool while defending the Earth, no matter how intense the battle gets.

70050000027153.name: Worms Rumble - Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack
70050000027153.description:
Worms in Spaaaaaace! Kit out your Worm with outfits, banners, emotes, weapon skins and titles that are out of this world!

The Spaceworm and Alien Double Pack Includes:
• 6 Outfits (Pioneer Outfit, Voyager Outfit, Apollo Outfit, Grey Alien Outfit, Green Alien Outfit, Pink Alien Outfit)
• 2 Banners (Invasion Banner and Rocket Banner)
• 2 Emotes (Salute Emote and Come In Peace Emote)
• 2 Weapon Skins (Neon Invader Weapon Skin and Golden Space Weapon Skin)
• 2 Titles (Invader and Explorer)

70050000027164.name: Masterpieces of World  - Impressionism -
70050000027164.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
-The Japanese Footbridge / Claude Monet
-Bedroom in Arles / Vincent van Gogh
-The starry night / Vincent van Gogh
-Luncheon of the Boating Party / Pierre-Auguste Renoir
-Portrait of Irène Cahen d'Anvers / Pierre-Auguste Renoir
-Apples And Oranges / Paul Cézanne
-A Bar at the Folies-Bergère / Édouard Manet
-Femmes de Tahiti / Paul Gauguin
-The Ballet Class / Edgar Degas
-At the Moulin Rouge / Henri de Toulouse-Lautrec

70050000027168.name: Beautiful Castles in Japan
70050000027168.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
-Himeji Castle / Hyōgo Prefecture
-Matsumoto Castle / Nagano Prefecture
-Matsue Castle / Shimane Prefecture
-Nagoya Castle / Aichi Prefecture
-Kumamoto Castle / Kumamoto Prefecture
-Okayama Castle / Okayama Prefecture
-Odawara Castle / Kanagawa Prefecture
-Fukuyama Castle / Hiroshima Prefecture
-Nijō Castle / Kyoto Prefecture
-Hikone Castle / Hikone Prefecture

70050000027172.name: Okinawa - Paradise in Japan -
70050000027172.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
-A Sea Turtle in Tokashiki Island
-Cape Manzamo
-Hibiscus rosa-sinensis
-Hirakubozaki Lighthouse, Ishigaki Island
-Kourijima Island across the Kouri Bridge
-Maedamisaki Cape
-Shisa, a Okinawan guardian lion on a Ryukyu red tile roof
-Woman on her way to the Sea
-Kafubanta cliff on Miyagijima Island
-Ocellaris clownfish

70050000027174.name: Colorful Birds
70050000027174.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
-Scarlet macaw
-Keel-billed toucan
-Peafowl
-Common kingfisher
-European bee-eater
-Indian roller
-Mandarin duck
-Scarlet ibis
-Scarlet macaw ②
-Toco toucan

70050000027176.name: Little Kittens / Kenta Igarashi
70050000027176.description:
This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces". The following 10 puzzle images are included.
Munchkin Kitten①
Munchkin Kitten②
Munchkin Kitten③
Chartreux Kitten①
Munchkin Kitten④
Munchkin Kitten⑤
Chartreux Kitten②
Munchkin Kitten⑥

70050000027202.name: 【Ryza 1 Million Units Celebration】 High Summer Formal
70050000027202.intro: A chic little black dress for Ryza!
70050000027202.description:
“High Summer Formal” is a new special costume for Ryza.

It commemorates the fact that “Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy” have exceeded one million units sold worldwide.

Costumes can be changed by selecting "Changing Room" from the diary found on the desk in Ryza's atelier.
Note: For more details please visit the official website: https://www.koeitecmoeurope.com/ryza2/

70050000027205.name: 【Ryza 1 Million Units Celebration】White Lily of Summer
70050000027205.intro: "White Lily of Summer”—a pure white dress for Ryza!
70050000027205.description:
“White Lily of Summer” is a new special costume for Ryza.
It commemorates the fact that “Atelier Ryza: Ever Darkness & the Secret Hideout” and “Atelier Ryza 2: Lost Legends & the Secret Fairy” have exceeded one million units sold worldwide.

Costumes can be changed by selecting "Changing Room" from the diary found on either the desk in Ryza's room or the desk in her atelier.

Note: For more details please visit the official website: https://www.koeitecmoeurope.com/ryza/

70050000027251.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Display Frames Set 1
70050000027251.description: A set of wallpapers for use in-game, modeled after the designs and artwork of the titles included in Capcom Arcade Stadium.

70050000027256.name: Capcom Arcade Stadium: Invincibility
70050000027256.description:
Unlocks the Invincibility feature, which allows you to play any of the included games with invincibility on.

Note: While the Invincibility feature prevents the player from taking damage, it is still possible to die in-game depending on how each game works (e.g. falling in a hole).

70050000027321.name: UNO® 50th Anniversary DLC
70050000027321.description:
It's time to celebrate the golden anniversary of the popular card game with UNO® 50th Anniversary DLC! We've put on our black-tie best for such an occasion. Featuring all the fast-paced fun and unpredictable twists you love and based on the stunning physical edition of the game. It's time to celebrate in style! 

Main Features: 
- Gorgeous, velvety black cards to dress your cards in the very best
- The exclusive 50/50 card and an elegant, special gold coin. Toss the coin to decide who has to draw four extra cards!

Will YOU be the first to clear your hand and claim victory?

70050000027324.name: Zara Larsson - "Look What You've Done"
70050000027324.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Look What You've Done' by Zara Larsson! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000027325.name: Alesso & Armin van Buuren - "Leave A Little Love"
70050000027325.description: Expand your FUSER™ library with 'Leave A Little Love' by Alesso & Armin van Buuren! Bring something new to your mixes with this additional playable track, available immediately in-game. Requires FUSER base game to play. For music credits, visit www.fuser.com.

70050000027327.name: Disgaea 6 Starter Support Set
70050000027327.description:
A free set of items that come in handy at the start of the game.
- 10,000 HL
- 500 Mana
- Mint Gum x5
- Unopened Soda x5
- Slippers x3
- 2x Boost Ticket x1

70050000027346.name: King's Bounty II - Day One Edition Pack
70050000027346.description:
Hounds of War Warhorse:
A unique creature, your best friend… and a real horror for your enemies.

Elite Guard premium pack:
Unlock special skins for your army!

Flaming Eagles: 
This unique a red-hot living creature using his claws, beak, and special skills.

Firehand Golems:
Firehand Golems is an experimental version of the Sentry Golem with flamethrowers.

Armored Princess’s Shield: 
This shield once protected a legendary warrior from another world...

70050000027347.name: King's Bounty II - Lord's Edition Upgrade
70050000027347.description:
Upgrade to the Lord's Edition bolsters your epic adventure into a fantasy world of Antara with digital DLCs.

The King's Bounty II Lord's Edition includes the following content:

• Rod of Deception 
• Frosthammer 
• Staff of Harmony 
• Tyrant's Sword 
• Armor of the Hollow
• Heroes & Villains Premium Pack
• King‘s Watchdogs

70050000027360.name: Disgaea 6 Innocent Equipment Set
70050000027360.description:
A set of equipment that have Innocents that will certainly give you the upper hand in battle!

Contains Innocents that increase the amount of HL, Mana, and EXP you gain from battle, and ones that increase the amount of critical hit damage.

70050000027361.name: Disgaea 6 Hololive Collaboration Set
70050000027361.description: A set of unique characters with special colors, voices, and equipment.

70050000027362.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Mao
70050000027362.description: Adds Mao from Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice to join your party!

70050000027363.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Raspberyl
70050000027363.description: Adds Raspberyl from Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice to join your party!

70050000027364.name: Disgaea 6 Zed and Bieko Color & Equipment Set
70050000027364.description: Special character colors and equipment for Zed and Bieko.

70050000027365.name: Disgaea 6 Melodia Color & Equipment Set
70050000027365.description: A special character color and equipment for Melodia.

70050000027366.name: Disgaea 6 Majolene Color & Equipment Set
70050000027366.description: A special character color and equipment for Majolene.

70050000027367.name: Disgaea 6 Misedor Color & Equipment Set
70050000027367.description: A special character color and equipment for Misedor.

70050000027370.description: Special character colors and equipment for Laharl, Etna, and Flonne.

70050000027371.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Valvatorez
70050000027371.description: Adds Valvatorez from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027372.description: Adds Pleinair to join your party!

70050000027373.description: Adds Fuka from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027374.description: Adds Desco from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten to join your party!

70050000027375.description: Adds Killia from Disgaea 5: Alliance of Vengeance to join your party!

70050000027376.name: Disgaea 6 Character: Usalia
70050000027376.description: Adds Usalia from Disgaea 5: Alliance of Vengeance to join your party!

70050000027402.name: Special Music Pack Vol. 4
70050000027402.intro: Fun to play with TOUHOU Spell Bubble! Special Music Pack, Vol. 4 is here!!
70050000027402.description:
"Special Music Pack Vol. 4" is a collection of arranged music selected by the development team that is fun to play with Spell Bubble!
The new artist added to this set is C-CRAYS and Karento!!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Music
・Sound!CHIREI MY WAY! / Shinra-Bansho
・Dark Flight Dreamer / REDALiCE feat. Ayumi Nomiya
・Shiny Up! / C-CLAYS
・Haruzora Hallelujah / Girls Logic Observatory
・Konya, Shoujo Ja Irarenai / TaNaBaTa
・Love Suspense of the Moon and Madness / Karento

■6 challenge stages total.
・Lv.4:Shine brightly(Shiny Up!)
・Lv.6:I Can't Stop Loving It.(Love Suspense of the Moon and Madness)
・Lv.7:I Admire Cirno Pro.(Sound!CHIREI MY WAY!)
・Lv.8:Happy to Win, Disappointed to Lose(Konya, Shoujo Ja Irarenai)
・Lv.9:We Finally Got Her!(Dark Flight Dreamer)
・Lv.10:Yuyuko-Sama, It's Springtime.(Haruzora Hallelujah)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.

70050000027429.name: Touhou Eurobeat Pack
70050000027429.intro: Introducing the “Touhou Eurobeat Pack” featuring Touhou Eurobeat classics!
70050000027429.description:
The brand new “Touhou Eurobeat Pack” contains
selected classics from popular Touhou Eurobeat tunes!
New artists featured include the Eurobeat Union led by DJ Command, as well as CrazyBeats known for his “Initial T” works!

This pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
　・INFINITE WORLD [DJ Command Remix]
　　/ SOUND HOLIC Vs. Eurobeat Union feat. Nana Takahashi
　・Endless Seeker / A-One
　・U-N-K-N-O-W-N / CrazyBeats feat. Reon Kurosaki
　・Together Going My Way / DiGiTAL WiNG
　・Signs of Autumn / Eurobeat Union feat. NU-KO
　・AGEPOYO TONIGHT / IOSYS

■6 challenge stages total.
　・Lv.5 Signs of Scoop!(Signs of Autumn)
　・Lv.6 Going My Game!(Together Going My Way)
　・Lv.7 Searching Forever(Endless Seeker)
　・Lv.8 4 a.m.(AGEPOYO TONIGHT)
　・Lv.9 No Spoilers Allowed(INFINITE WORLD [DJ Command Remix] )
　・Lv.10 Strategy Unknown?(U-N-K-N-O-W-N)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.

70050000027430.name: Early Bird Pack
70050000027430.description:
Get yourselves prepared for your important postal duties with this selection of employee themed accessories! Look the part, unlock new objectives and gain extra stamps with the Experimental Postal Pack contraption!

Experimental Postal Pack Backwear - Unlock additional mini-games exclusively with the Experimental Postal Pack accessory! Gain extra stamps to buy in-game accessories from completing these additional, fun tasks!

Zuni the Baby Octopus Backwear - Zuni would love nothing more than to ride along on Jeff and Debra’s back as they perform their postal duties!

Cassowary Cowl Facewear - The Telepost cassowary team are not known for their observational skills, so disguise yourself as one with this wearable mask!

Buck’s Big Bushy Beard Facewear – Fortunately Telepost chief Buck Hamm has a good sense of humor, so he’ll probably appreciate the kiwis imitating his trademark look with this set!

70050000027445.name: The Thrice Damned 3: Great Pyramid of Bes
70050000027445.description:
A perilous pyramid full of terrifying traps? A troublesome teleporter to the afterlife? Old foes seeking revenge? Sounds like the climax to this terrifying tale will be anything but a walk in the park for our heroes!

Grab a stiff drink, adventurer, the Great Pyramid of Bes is the thrilling finale to the Thrice Damned campaign.

The legendary Shield of Bes may be complete and hordes of foes in the ground once more, but there's still work to be done!

Finish the tantalising tale in this epic conclusion and blast your way to the finale solo or in 2-4 player co-op!

70050000027446.name: Dashing Outfits Pack
70050000027446.description:
Make sure you’re wearing your Sunday best, even when fighting off hordes of the undead!

Look the bee’s knees with the Dashing Outfits Pack. Including swanky new outfits for Frank, Gracie, Nalangu, and Archimedes, this pack is ideal for the budding adventurer looking to stand out from the crowd while sending mummies back to the underworld.

70050000027447.name: Secret Service Weapons Pack
70050000027447.description:
Face down fantastic foes with this peerless package of top-notch firepower designed for Strange Brigade agents in the field! With three new firearms perfectly balanced for the discerning adventurer, the Secret Service Weapons Pack includes:

WILKERS & WHITE P19 (Pistol)
Love to shoot the supernatural? Hate wasting ammo? You’re in luck! With its butter-smooth handling the P19 pistol takes accuracy to new heights.

STOUDENMIRE 960 (Submachine gun)
The Stoudenmire may not be the heaviest of fellows, but when it fires over 900 rounds per minute with alarming accuracy, it'll do far more than just bruise a beasty!

GEHRI-DELGANE S1 (Rifle)
This one-of-a-kind collaboration from Gehrig and Delgane packs a punch like no-other, but takes nerves of steel, or a damn fine schnapps, to master its brutish strength!

70050000027448.name: Maharani Huntress Character Expansion Pack
70050000027448.description:
Grab your gear, a new Strange Brigade member has joined the hunt: Anjali Khan, tracker extraordinaire!

The secret Maharani ruler of a prosperous Indian state, it was only after the discovery of an unholy curse on her family that Anjali joined up with the Strange Brigade in the hopes of tracking down and defeating the demon that afflicted it once and for all. 

The Maharani Huntress character expansion pack includes playable character Anjali Khan and the following:

- Spear of the Ice age amulet power
- Audley A40 Exemplar SMG
- Eastleigh M1 rifle
- Cluster Grenade special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, solo or in online co-op.

70050000027449.name: Japanese Naval Officer Character Expansion Pack
70050000027449.description:
All hands on deck, a new Strange Brigade member has joined the crew: Hachiro Shimizu, master survivalist! 

Once part of a secret mission to explore a remote Pacific Island, Shimizu and his crew found themselves shipwrecked and victim to the island's monstrous miscreants. Shimizu alone survived long enough to be rescued by the Strange Brigade, and has been with them ever since. 

The Japanese Naval Officer character expansion pack includes playable character Hachiro Shimizu and the following: 

- Decaying Demon Blast amulet power
- Mikhailov-38 rifle
- Marchador TT pistol
- Shock Grenade special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, solo or in online co-op.

70050000027450.name: American Aviatrix Character Expansion Pack
70050000027450.description:
A brand new Strange Brigade agent swoops in with a new amulet power and new weapons. Introducing: Tessie Caldwell, rebel of the skies!
A former stunt-pilot, Tessie’s fearlessness caught the eye of the Strange Brigade and now she thrill seeks all over the world, bathing the undead in a hail of fire, ice and bullets from her iconic 1930s firearms.

The American Aviatrix character expansion pack includes playable character Tessie Caldwell and the following:
-	Infernal Firestorm amulet power
-	Hyde & Sons Compact pistol
-	Colbeck Wildfire submachine gun
-	Glacier Bomb special item

All contents of this pack can be used in any mode, either solo and in online co-op.

70050000027451.name: Texas Cowboy Character Pack
70050000027451.description:
Play as Patrick "Bash" Conaghan, a rootin'-tootin' gunslinging addition to the Strange Brigade!

A rough-around-the-edges brawler and adventurer, "Bash" is happy to go wherever there's danger and treasure to be found. Along with brand new amulet power, his master gunslinger skills bless him with hefty headshots and fast recharging explosives!

70050000027452.name: Gentleman Explorer Character Pack
70050000027452.description:
Play as Winston Bey, a dapper new addition to the Strange Brigade!

Explorer, prospector, journalist, spy, diplomat, gentleman traveller ... Winston Bey's adventures have taken him all over the world! An adept addition to the team, his extensive travels have blessed him with a tougher-than-average constitution and a wider radius for soul gathering.

70050000027491.name: Climate Board Game Expansion
70050000027491.intro:
The Climate swings between Scorching Hot and Ice Ages, affecting creatures big and small in different ways.  
Events such as Wildfires or Meteorites can change the game!
70050000027491.description: The Climate Track and Events add another layer of strategy to the Evolution game series.  Influence it to help your creatures prosper and cause your opponents creatures to go extinct.  Experience 6 new Traits, 30 Events, and the power of the Climate Track in Climate Board Game.

70050000027518.name: Experience x3 - Chroma Quaternion
70050000027518.description:
All characters' experience gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000027523.name: RP x3 - Chroma Quaternion
70050000027523.description:
All characters' RP gained increases by 200%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000027527.name: Experience & RP x2 - Chroma Quaternion
70050000027527.description:
All characters' experience and RP gained increases by 100%.
Effect stacks for similar items.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000027535.name: Damage x2 - Chroma Quaternion
70050000027535.description:
Damage dealt to enemies is doubled.
Settings can be changed in the Option section of the menu.

70050000027579.name: "Felyne Ears" Hunter layered armor piece
70050000027579.description:
Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000027587.description:

70050000027593.name: "Monster Hunter Series Bases" BGM
70050000027593.description:
Take a musical trip down memory lane with this collection of past Monster Hunter base themes!

- "Awakening" BGM
- "Pokke Village Theme" BGM
- "The Village of Wind and Meadow - Bherna Village" BGM
- "Hunters of the Skies" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.

70050000027594.name: "Monster Music: Dance Version" BGM
70050000027594.description:
Get your groove on with these dance remixes of music from the Monster Hunter Rise soundtrack!

- "Breath of Ire: Dance Remix" BGM
- "Lady of Lightning: Dance Remix" BGM
- "Barbarous Beast - Magnamalo: Dance Remix" BGM
- "Roaming Red Roar: Dance Remix" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.

70050000027595.name: "Out on the Hunt" Cohoot outfit
70050000027595.description:
Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Change Clothes section of the Pet menu.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000027596.name: "Li'l Wingdrake" Cohoot outfit
70050000027596.description:
Dress up your Cohoot pet with this special outfit!

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Change Clothes section of the Pet menu.

Note: This item is cosmetic only and does not confer any status benefits.

70050000027597.name: "Special Stickers 2" Sticker Set
70050000027597.description:
Have fun communicating with other players using stickers!

This add-on contains:

- "Special Stickers 2" Sticker Set
Adorable furry friends abound in this set of Palico and Palamute stickers! You can even edit the text that appears in the speech bubbles.

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Chat menu.

70050000027607.name: Pet Shop Snacks Expansion Pack 1
70050000027607.description:
More pets to feed in this content update! Prepare some of the most sophisticated dishes and finish new levels!

In this expansion pack you will find:
-20 new levels,
-6 new achievements

70050000027613.name: Pet Shop Snacks Expansion Pack 2
70050000027613.description:
You prepare the best food, so happy pets just keep coming! Satisfy them on this set of a whole new levels!

In this expansion pack you will find:
-20 new levels,
-6 new achievements

70050000027614.name: Prison Architect - Second Chances
70050000027614.description:
Prison Architect: Second Chances gives your inmates a fresh start with reform and rehabilitation features, helping them improve behaviors and reduce sentences.

Key Features

Return to Reform: New programs, such as Animal Therapy, Meetings with civilians, and Conflict Resolution classes led by former prisoners can remove an inmate's negative traits and see improved behaviors.

Good Behavior: Inmates can have their sentences reduced or increased based on their actions and reoffenders can now be sent back to prison. Players will be rewarded for each rehabilitated inmate and fined for each reoffender.

Room for Improvement: Inmates with existing or earned work credentials can become vendors to both prisoners and visitors in inmate-run rooms, including a Bakery and Restaurant.

Back to Society: Inmates can earn work experience by partaking in different work and training programs.

70050000027656.name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon Expansion Pack 1
70050000027656.description:
Start serving takeout sweets, using brand new equipment—decorative boxes. Pure sweetness awaits you in this special stages! 

This DLC contains 15 new levels and 7 new achievements.

70050000027657.name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon Expansion Pack 2
70050000027657.description:
Test your skill with the most demanding levels in the game and claim the title of the Dessert King! Delicious cakes, refreshing cocktails and decorative boxes—this DLC pack has it all!

This DLC contains 15 new levels and 7 new achievements.

70050000027692.name: Ena's Outfit: Tropical Dress
70050000027692.description:
Contains the following content:

● Ena's Outfit: Tropical Dress

This content is cosmetic and does not confer any status benefits.

Note: After purchasing, restart the game to receive add-on content. Outfits can be changed using the chest in Your House after progressing the game to a certain point.

70050000027709.name: Character Edit Ticket One-Pack
70050000027709.description:
Character Edit Vouchers allow you to the appearance of your character once per voucher. Use a from the chest in Your House to edit your appearance. Please note that the name of your character cannot be changed.

This add-on contains:

● Character Edit Ticket (1)

Note: After purchasing, restart the game to receive add-on content. This add-on content can only be obtained once. Each ticket is consumed upon saving the edited character. You can edit hair, makeup and armour colour from chest in Your House without using a ticket.
